name: Serrated
desc: Victims hit by the Perk holder take 1 HP per second of extra damage for the next 10 seconds.

name: Heart Attack
desc: A victim's bleed out increases by 1 HP per second for 60 seconds if they trigger an electric trap or are hit by the perk holder's barge.

name: Rough Cut
desc: Hitting a Victim with the chainsaw causes 1 HP of extra damage per second for 14 seconds.

name: Hurt Em'
desc: Barbed wire traps do 500% more damage (30 damage). Increases the damage dealt to a Victim caught in barbed wire for 45 seconds if they continue to run while barbed wire is attached to them.

name: Venom
desc: Victims caught in traps take 1 HP of extra damage per second for 45 seconds.

name: Toxic Cloud
desc: The poison seeps into the Victim's wounds, causing them to lose 1 HP per second for the next 60 seconds.

name: Back For Blood
desc: When sneak attacking Grandpa you decrease Family bond by an extra 30% and heal for 40% health.

name: Sanguine Shadow
desc: If you drop below 70%, it can be refilled slowly by staying hidden and motionless in shadows or hiding spots. Health received is 3 HP per second.

name: Medical Benefits
desc: Healing a fellow Victim also heals yourself. The amount of health received will be 125% of total healing applied to your teammate.

name: Extra Drip
desc: After using a health item, you will continue to receive 4 HP for 12 seconds.

name: Safety In Numbers
desc: While all Victims are alive and before any have escaped, you receive 30% bonus to your max health and stamina.

name: Bounce Back Better
desc: Healing items used on you are 50% more effective. Counts for being healed and healing yourself.

name: Blood Clot Cry
desc: Receive 30 health whenever Grandpa activates his Sonar ability. Has infinite charges.

name: Pep Talk
desc: Sweet-talking Grandpa heals you by 40% of your maximum HP.

name: Grandpa levelling units
desc:
Leatherface cutting barricades: 25 blood
Leatherface destroying crawl spaces: 25 blood
Cook succesful pings: 20 blood
Victim triggering Hitchhickers' traps: 50 blood
Victim jumping out of a window: 25 blood
Victim executed: 50 blood
Victim detected by grandpa when near him: 50 blood
Victim found in hiding spot: 75 blood

name: Grandpa perks
desc: All Grandpa perks have been reduced by 1 level.
